welcome.title: Welcome to BodyMetrics
welcome.subtitle: Segmental Body Composition Analysis with total privacy.
welcome.guide_1_text: This app does NOT store raw measurement data. It only saves the **association** (link) between a measurement ID and a Client you create. The actual data lives on your SD card.
welcome.guide_2_text: Every time you enter or refresh the app: 1. **Drag or load the SD files** into the Inbox. 2. **Assign** each measurement to the corresponding client. (If this is your first time using the app, you can create your first client below to get started).
welcome.guide_3_text:
The scale has only 4 slots, but you can measure unlimited people without deleting data using this trick: 
1. **REMOVE SD CARD** (Very important). 
2. Press and hold **SET**, select your 'wildcard' user (e.g. #4), and update Age/Height. 
3. At the end, it asks 'CLr?'. Select **YES** (Don't worry, since the SD card is out, nothing important is deleted). 
4. **INSERT SD CARD** and weigh. 
(The scale will append the new data to the file without erasing previous history).
welcome.guide_4_text: You have full control: create/delete clients, unassign measurements if you make a mistake, and use the **Spreadsheet** button inside each client to get a clean .CSV file ready for use in any spreadsheet program or to email.
welcome.guide_5_text: Your Client List is saved in this browser's memory. If you switch computers or clear cache, you might lose the names (though not the SD measurements). Go to **Settings > Download Backup** regularly. You can use this backup on another browser or device to restore the associations you created.
welcome.guide_6_text: Transparent open-source project. You can review the code, contribute, or install it on your own offline local server.
